metadata.title: CVE-2014-0214 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: login/token.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.10, 2.5.x before2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3 creates a MoodleMobile web-service token withan infinite lifetime, which makes it easier for remote attackers to hijacksessions via a brute-force attack.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
